docstring.long_description:
Requires a CONNECT_MSO2X block to create the connection.

Tested on MSO22 and MSO24.
docstring.short_description: Returns the curve query on a MSO2X oscilloscope, in voltage vs time.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The VISA address (requires the CONNECTION_MSO2X block).

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Oscilloscope channel to query (eg 1 or 2 for a 2 channel scope)

returns.description: Curve query results, in voltage vs time.
